programme.title: Saving Jesus From Nyaope
programme.short_synopsis: A heroin-based drug called 'Nyaope' is destroying young lives in South Africa’s townships.
programme.medium_synopsis: A heroin-based drug called nyaope is destroying lives in South Africa’s towns. Our reporter Golden Mtika finds an old friend, Jesus, addicted to the drug and scavenging in a sewer.
programme.long_synopsis:
Warning: contains scenes of drug use.

A heroin-based drug cocktail called nyaope is destroying young lives in South Africa’s townships.

Our reporter Golden Mtika finds an old family friend, Jesus, addicted to the drug and scavenging in an open sewer.

While Jesus goes into rehab, Golden goes in search of the dealers who bribe the police and push the drug. But will Jesus get clean?

programme.title: Africa Eye
programme.short_synopsis: Original and high-impact BBC investigations from across Africa
